pricing.rightPlan: Choose the Right Plan for You
pricing.choosePlan: Select the plan that best fits your needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Check out our most common questions about YogiTech.
faq.answer1: YogiTech is an AI-powered yoga mentor that gives real-time pose feedback.
faq.question2: How do I use the app?
faq.answer2: Download it from the app store and start practicing.
faq.answer3: Yes, the basic features are free for everyone.
faq.answer4: Premium features are available with subscription.
faq.answer5: Contact our support team via email.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: We developed an AI Yoga app that provides real-time feedback on your poses, supporting both English and Vietnamese.
aboutUs.overviewDescription: YogiTech is an AI-powered yoga platform that gives real-time feedback to help you practice safely and effectively.

footer.description: YogiTech is a platform that connects you with experts to enhance your skills.
